admreg: East Asia and Pacific,East Asia and Pacific

abstracts.cdata!:
The project would expand the Bank
            Group's support of ABC's (Agricultural Bank of
            China) medium and long-term lending for the diversification
            and modernization of agricultural production and processing
            which was initiated by the ongoing first Rural Credit
            Project (1462-CHA). Project subloans would be provided by
            ABC to individual farmers and households, collective units,
            and enterprises owned by local government entities and
            collectives in the two provinces of Fujian and Hunan to
            finance investments for the development of aquaculture,
            orchards, agroprocessing and livestock enterprises. A
            technical assistance component is included to effectively
            implement the project and to strengthen the operations of
            ABC. At full development, the value of the incremental
            output from the project would be about US$140 million p.a.
            The project would benefit directly some 16,000 families from
            increased production and incomes, and generate additional
            employment equivalent to 61,000 full time jobs.
